name: EscapeTheBlob
description:
Did you work in a team?
Completly alone

Was the resolution a challenge?
realized really late what you can actually see

What did you learn?

Working in a team is a better idea. My plans were not clear enough and it fell appart really fast. But I  "completed" it 


I was late with my submission for the lowresjam but i decided to release it anyway
